title: Shivers - New Guitar Summit with Randy Bachman - 2008 [flac]
description:
Shivers - The New Guitar Summit's second album.
Jay Geils, Duke Robillard and Gerry Beaudoin are joined for a couple of songs on this one by famed rock and roll guitarist Randy Bachman (who learned a lot of his jazz licks from the great Lenny Breau).

"On Shivers, the three guitarists come together again to play a rousing set of vintage jazz and blues music, the kind that inspired each player to become the masters of their instruments.
